page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE(CONTINUED)
page.content: Accidents/problems occur everyday,the cooks favourite is burning the cafe's dinner! There is a lot of cleaning up to do at the end of the day.They try to do the cleaning before the shop closes at 5:30 pm. Unsold goods are recycled. Mr Hodson does the paperwork and the orders. The business has done very well over the last 2 years since they began making some of their own produce. Their day does not end when the shop closes as they have to do their own housework,etc, when they get home.
